acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle the manufacturing of POJOs which inherit from other classes
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleTheManufacturingOfPojosWhichInheritFromOtherClasses

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ClassInheritedPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the Object should not be null
Then the two objects class java.lang.String and class java.lang.String should be equal
